i1.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Veigar''' generates a [[stack]] of ''Phenomenal Evil'' for each enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by his [[champion ability|abilities]], and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion {{tip|takedown}}.
{{sbc|Phenomenal Evil:}} For each stack, '''Veigar''' gains {{sti|AP|{{as|1 ability power}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy champion hit by his champion ability, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion takedown.
Phenomenal Evil: For each stack, Veigar gains 1 ability power.
i1.notes:
* The two effects stack, granting 6 stacks for each enemy champion taken down by an ability, 7 with {{ai|Baleful Strike|Veigar}}.
* '''Veigar's''' abilities do not have to deal damage nor affect their targets to grant a stack.

q1.name: Baleful Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Veigar''' blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first two enemies hit.
If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of ''{{ai|Phenomenal Evil Power|Veigar|Phenomenal Evil}}'', tripled against large {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.
If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of Veigar's Phenomenal Evil, tripled against large minions and monsters.

w1.name: Dark Matter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Veigar''' casts down a mass of dark matter that falls to the target location after a {{rutngt|1.2}} {{tt|delay|from the start of the cast time}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
''Dark Matter's'' cooldown is {{sti|cdr|reduced}} based on stacks of ''{{ai|Phenomenal Evil Power|Veigar|Phenomenal Evil}}''.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Veigar casts down a mass of dark matter that falls to the target location after a 1.221 delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Dark Matter's cooldown is reduced based on stacks of Veigar's Phenomenal Evil.
w1.notes:
* The delay starts at the beginning of the cast time.
** If '''Veigar''' dies during the cast time, ''Dark Matter'' will still successfully fall from the sky.
* ''Dark Matter'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the area during the delay.

e1.name: Event Horizon
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Veigar''' forms a cage at the target location that erects after a {{fd|0.5}} second delay, and remains for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a duration.
Enemies can only be affected by ''Event Horizon's'' effects once per cast.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, and remains for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are knocked down and stunned for a duration.
Enemies can only be affected by Event Horizon's effects once per cast.
e1.notes:
* The stun and the knockdown are applied to units that are within a certain distance interval from the center of the area of effect.
* An enemy can be affected by ''Event Horizon'' only once every {{fd|4.5}} seconds.
* Units that negate the stun will still count as passing through the edges. They will become immune to the effects of ''Event Horizon'' for the period even after negating them.
* {{tip|Displacement immune}} enemies will still be {{tip|stun|stunned}}, but not {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}}.
* At the start of the cast time, all enemy {{tip|champions}} in a 390-radius become marked for '''Veigar''' to gain an {{tip|takedown|assist}} on them should they perish within the standard 10 seconds assist time.
* ''Event Horizon'' may fail to catch enemies that move very quickly through the boundary distance.
** More modern area checks such as {{cai|The Box|Thresh}} or {{cai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}} do not have this issue.
